titles.title: To extend until January 1, 1995, the existing suspension of duty on bendiocarb.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/13/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend the duty on 2,2,-Dimethyl-1,3-benzodioxol-4-yl methylcarbamate (bendiocarb) through December 31, 1994.
